query: SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(COLUMN_NAME) as columns FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'videos';
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway03.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user EYCHuWF6Uz6Nxf8.root --database oRagAHAnrpgHQWa5YM6DEy --execute SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(COLUMN_NAME) as columns FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'videos';
